title: Bugsplat after champ select
body: Whenever i try to play a game i always get bugsplat after champ select. i have searched all over youtube but could not find a solution. i have even tried re instaling LOL but it didn't work

replies.body:
Bugsplats usually hint that something is going on with either your system drivers or hardware. Our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) consolidates the most common solutions for this issue, so I recommend giving those steps a go.

Let me know if this helped.

In that case, we'll need to dive into your system logs to troubleshoot this further. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can continue taking a look at this.

If you run a set of logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to your ticket, you'll be doing our techs a favor when they pick up your ticket. Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.
I am also getting that same issue. I am currently re-installing to see if it will fix it. Caused me a leave in a ranked game.
